title: Canceling A Reservation
description:
To cancel your reservation, head over to the **Stays** tab and tap the **My stay** card to change or cancel your upcoming stay.

A couple of things to note:

- Cancellation policies may vary depending on the rate of your reservation.
- Most hotels typically can change or cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before check-in.
- You'll want to double check your hotel's confirmation details and communication policy.
